sentences.sContent: Davis won the 400 metre hurdles in a new Olympic time of 49.3 sec.
sentences.sCn: 戴维斯以49.3秒这一新的奥运会记录在400米跨栏赛跑中夺冠。

phrases.pCn: n. 障碍竞赛；跳栏赛跑

words.tran: 制造竹篱笆者；跳栏比赛选手

trans.tranOther: Hurdles is a race in which people have to jump over a number of obstacles that are also called hurdles. You can use hurdles to refer to one or more races.
